name: FC - S - Flashing installation
Head flashing installed with sealant at windows and doors (STO system)
Rainshield installed between joinery and lintel (brick)
DPC and WANZ bar installed at the bottom of the joinery (see fixing) as per manufacturer's spec
Aluminium window jamb side flashings are installed
All flashing installed at windows and doors to specification & within tolerance in respective area(s)
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
FC - S - Tapes
3m taping around windows and sliders around the exterior framings as per the manufacturer specifications
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
FC - S - Soffits
Pre-Installation Checks
Wiring in and anchored down for downlights, checked and accurate
Air Conditioning pre wire and pipe completed and acceptable
Fire sprinklers droppers installed and acceptable
Soffits works checks
Framing completed, checked and accurate including sheet joins/blocking
Framing centre correct at 600mm centres, including set out to allow all sheets joints to be fully supported
Villaboard installed, stopped and painted, checked and acceptable
Plaster installed as per spec and painted and acceptable
All soffits completed and acceptable
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
